Subject:The Game
Message 1292 of 4024
I will get out the moment we get there and enjoy a nice walk in the sun.
I am Adrian’s Dad. I want to demonstrate  I support him and be in his corner. I don’t want this to be an “All Mom” thing.
We agreed to do this together. When he is present, let’s do it together. We can accommodate for him.
You will not be alone with me. Let’s show him that when he is involved, we put our adult stuff aside.
Thanks!
Sent:02/10/2024 at 12:53 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/10/2024 at 01:07 PM)
Subject:It is a gorgeous day
Message 1293 of 4024
Yes at ICS. We swap notes each time. They are looking to move him too.
Sent:02/10/2024 at 01:07 PM

Subject:Re: The Game

I still don’t think you understand impact to me hence the RO.
